Class BoundField

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeneralEMField
      • BoundField

  • public class BoundField
extends GeneralEMField

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected GeneralEMField otherField 
      protected double xBounds
      Represents an arbitrary electromagnetic field which is only active in a certain region.

      Represents an arbitrary electromagnetic field which is only active in a certain region.

      Represents an arbitrary electromagnetic field which is only active in a certain region.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoundField(GeneralEMField Field)
      Constructor with one input - the field being bound
      BoundField(GeneralEMField Field, double x, double y)
      Constructor with three inputs - the field and where its bound in the x and y direction
      BoundField(GeneralEMField Field, double x, double y, double z)
      Constructor with four inputs - the field and where its bound in all 3 spacial dimensions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PhysicsVector getAcceleration(ChargedParticle theParticle, double t)
      Returns the acceleration experienced by a charged particle according to the Lorentz force law (non-relativistic) if the particle is in range of the bound field
      PhysicsVector getAcceleration(ChargedParticle theParticle, double t, PhysicsVector velocity)
      Returns the acceleration experienced by a charged particle according to the Lorentz force law (non-relativistic) if the particle is in range of the bound field

      Get the magnetic flux density being experienced by a particle

      Get the magnetic flux density being experienced by a particle

      Get the potential energy of a particle due to the field

      • xBounds

        protected double xBounds
        Represents an arbitrary electromagnetic field which is only active in a certain region. SI units are used throughout.

      • getAcceleration

        public PhysicsVector getAcceleration(ChargedParticle theParticle,
                                     double t)
        Returns the acceleration experienced by a charged particle according to the Lorentz force law (non-relativistic) if the particle is in range of the bound field
        Overrides:
        getAcceleration in class GeneralEMField
        Parameters:
        theParticle - - the charged particle moving in the field
        t - - time
        Returns:
        the acceleration calculated from (qE + vXB / m) if in range

      • getAcceleration

        public PhysicsVector getAcceleration(ChargedParticle theParticle,
                                     double t,
                                     PhysicsVector velocity)
        Returns the acceleration experienced by a charged particle according to the Lorentz force law (non-relativistic) if the particle is in range of the bound field
        Overrides:
        getAcceleration in class GeneralEMField
        Parameters:
        theParticle - - the charged particle moving in the field
        t - - time
        velocity - - the velocity of the particle
        Returns:
        the acceleration calculated from (qE + vXB / m) if in range
